title: Racism is allowed in League of Legends, confirmed!
body:
Three man premade spent the last 5-10 minutes of the game telling everyone in the game how we are all a bunch of "dirty %%%%%%s".

Riot has no interest in responding to the problem.

The automated system didn't catch it (big surpsise).

Have fun lynching!

replies.body: the system dosnt ban after 1 game =) then the whole community would have been banned

> [{quoted}](name=lookbehindyu,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=dJ4akwpU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-28T16:52:16.091+0000)
>
> the system dosnt ban after 1 game =) then the whole community would have been banned

Not entirely true. Riot has a no tolerance policy toward racial or similar discrimination. The automated system *should* have caught this as it was outright, intended, racism. The fact I can't even manage to have an actual human look at the chat log, is pretty gross to me. The fact they outright ignore it, no doubt because it makes them look bad, makes it that much more gross.

Also, I doubt the entire community spends 5-10 minutes of every game telling everyone else in game that they're a "dirty n@gger".

It can take one bad game to get banned, but the system does not review a case every report. They must reach a certain threshold of report density first, which is usually several games worth (more toxic behavior usually results in more reports per game and therefore a review in fewer games though). Just because they didn't get reviewed this game doesn't mean they won't in the next, and you'll never know about it. You're getting way too upset over an assumption.

That contradicts what The Curator and Tantram replied to this very same guy in his previous post. He made a post during the game itself and asked what to do, and they both said to simply report, and that one report was enough to trigger a review of the game.

That isn't what they meant, so there may be some confusion. Only a single report is needed to flag a match, and a single report can tip the case to trigger a review. If you want clarification go talk to Tantram.

This wasn't a minor attack.

I appreciate your input Nami, I always do. The thing with this particular case, was the severity of it. It wasn't off colored jokes or mild ribbing, it was outright "I want banned you dirty fucking n@ggers". It was an outright personal attack on anyone of color, for the purpose of getting themselves banned. So, they're probably still doing this in game and yes I do have confirmation they're still joining matches (ranked at that).

This isn't just a little BM, this is one of those cases where, if I could get a Red to actually read the damn chat logs, those three players are guaranteed to be banned.

I really wish I had installed LSI on this computer before now, I'd be able to show you screen shots of chat, you'd better understand where I'm coming from.

The fact the Reds either ignore me or direct me to the Player Behavior section, which they admittedly pay little to no attention to, is just salt in the wound.
